tool.name: Alphafold UI
tool.command:
mkdir -p '${ html.files_path }' &&
wget -q -O - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neoformit/alphafold-galaxy/embedded/index.html > ${ html.files_path }/index.html &&
wget -q -O - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neoformit/alphafold-galaxy/main/data/ranked_0.pdb > '${ html.files_path }/ranked_0.pdb' &
wget -q -O - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neoformit/alphafold-galaxy/main/data/ranked_1.pdb > '${ html.files_path }/ranked_1.pdb' &
wget -q -O - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neoformit/alphafold-galaxy/main/data/ranked_2.pdb > '${ html.files_path }/ranked_2.pdb' &
wget -q -O - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neoformit/alphafold-galaxy/main/data/ranked_3.pdb > '${ html.files_path }/ranked_3.pdb' &
wget -q -O - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neoformit/alphafold-galaxy/main/data/ranked_4.pdb > '${ html.files_path }/ranked_4.pdb' &&
cp '${html.files_path}/index.html' output.html
